hourOfCode: Writing data for hacking stem experiments
hourOfCode.agentAnalyze: Check for any hazards in a direction
hourOfCode.agentAnalyze|param|dir: the direction to check for hazards
hourOfCode.agentDestroyL4: Commands the agent to destroy a block in the given direction
hourOfCode.agentDestroyL4|param|dir: the direction to destroy a block at
hourOfCode.agentDestroyL5: Commands the agent to destroy a block in the given direction
hourOfCode.agentDestroyL5|param|dir: the direction to destroy a block at
hourOfCode.agentDestroyL6: Commands the agent to destroy a block in the given direction
hourOfCode.agentDestroyL6|param|dir: the direction to destroy a block at
hourOfCode.agentDetectDryBrush: Detects if there is dry brush next to the agent in the specified direction
hourOfCode.agentDetectDryBrush|param|dir: the direction to detect the dry brush
hourOfCode.agentDetectDryFern: Detects if there is a dry fern next to the agent in the specified direction
hourOfCode.agentDetectDryFern|param|dir: the direction to detect the dry fern
hourOfCode.agentDetectDryGrass: Detects if there is dry grass next to the agent in the specified direction
hourOfCode.agentDetectDryGrass|param|dir: the direction to detect the dry grass
hourOfCode.agentLookForHazards: Agent watches the monitor for hazards
hourOfCode.agentPlaceAcacia: Commands the agent to place an acacia plank in the specified direction
hourOfCode.agentPlaceRedstoneTorch: Commands the agent to place a redstone torch in the specified direction
hourOfCode.agentPlantCarrots: Commands the agent to plant carrots downwards
hourOfCode.agentSeeHazard: Sees that there is a hazard on the monitor
hourOfCode.alertTeam: Warns the team of a high-risk area
hourOfCode.collectAndCount: Commands the agent to collect all nearby blocks and items
hourOfCode.goalNotReached: Checks whether the agent has reached the goal
hourOfCode.hazardsRemainL4: Checks that there are fire hazards
hourOfCode.hazardsRemainL5: Checks that there are fire hazards
hourOfCode.hazardsRemainL6: Checks that there are fire hazards
